Scope.message: break/continue must be used inside loop

Destruct.message: destruct can be used with types

TypeDeclared.message: type has already been declared before

ReDefined.message: variable has already been declared in the current scope

NotDeclaredFunction.message: function has not been declared in this scope

CountOfPartsOfAssign.message: the count of parties of assign are not equal

TypeOfPartsOfAssign.message: the type of parties of assign are not equal

ConstAssign.message: you cant assign a new value to constant or define it without value

ReturnWithoutAssign.message: you should assign a value to your return variables of function

StmtExpr.message: you can't use multi value in expressions of statement statement
